effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.
